duties_responsibilities.duty: Achieve the software/solutions/services delivery commitments of the team.
Maximize the effectiveness of the team and take actions to increase performance.
Develop, mentor, and coach team members while promoting and facilitating their professional development.
Work with product owners or other relevant partners and IT leadership to ensure a steady flow of valuable solutions from the team.
Oversee, evaluate, and address issues in the team's delivery.
Facilitate effective meetings and understand and influence the roles played by participants.
Champion change and support teams through change.
Think critically, challenge conventional thinking, and generate unique business insight to create a competitive advantage.

education_certification.credential: Bachelors degree in computer science preferred, or relevant technical experience (Master's preferred)
